title: Homestead National Monument of America: News
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News             News       View news releases to learn about Homestead's happenings.        Costumed Chataqua Actors NPS Photo  Special events, special programs, traveling exhibits, living history programs, hands-on activities for children, campfire programs, and other public programs are presented by the park throughout the year. Learn more about special events at Homestead National Monument of America.         Homestead National Monument of America is featured on the recent Nebraska America the Beautiful Quarter! Learn all about the Homestead quarter.
